Your %s1_UnitName has failed to expand %F2_RelIcon into %s3_CityName!
TEXT.French: Votre %s1_UnitName n'a pas réussi à développer la religion : %F2_RelIcon à %s3_CityName !
TEXT.German: %F2_RelIcon konnte von Eurer Einheit %s1_UnitName nicht nach %s3_CityName expandiert werden!
TEXT.Italian: La tua unità %s1_UnitName non è riuscita a diffondere la religione %F2_RelIcon a %s3_CityName!
TEXT.Spanish: [NUM1:Vuestro:Vuestra:Vuestros:Vuestras] %s1_UnitName [NUM1:no ha logrado:no ha logrado:no han logrado:no han logrado] expandir el %F2_RelIcon en %s3_CityName.

TEXT.French: La société commerciale %s1_CorpName a été fondée à %s2_CityName !

TEXT.English: %s1_CorpName has been incorporated in a distant land!
TEXT.French: La société commerciale %s1_CorpName a été fondée dans un pays lointain !
TEXT.German: Die Kapitalgesellschaft %s1_CorpName wurde in einem entfernten Land gegründet!
TEXT.Italian: La %s1_CorpName è stata fondata in terre lontane!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡%s1_CorpName se ha incorporado a una tierra lejana!

TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%F2 von jeder Stadt mit der Kapitalgesellschaft [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s3_corporation[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%F2 da ogni città in cui si trova la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s3_corporation[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: %s1_corporation has brought %s2_bonus to %s3_city. Increase this bonus by acquiring more %s4_bonus_list.
TEXT.French: %s1_corporation a amené un bonus en %s2_bonus à %s3_city. Augmentez ce bonus en obtenant une quantité en %s4_bonus_list plus importante.
TEXT.German: %s1_corporation hat %s3_city den Bonus %s2_bonus verschafft. Steigern Sie diesen Bonus, indem Sie mehr %s4_bonus_list erwerben.
TEXT.Italian: %s1_corporation ha portato %s2_bonus a %s3_city. Incrementa il bonus acquisendo altri %s4_bonus_list.
TEXT.Spanish: La %s1_corporation ha llevado %s2_bonus a %s3_city. Para aumentar esta bonificación, adquiere más %s4_bonus_list.

TEXT.Italian: Tutte le città (se c'è la religione ufficiale [ICON_RELIGION])

TEXT.Spanish: %D1%% a la tasa de natalidad de [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Religious Victory:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Sila: Be at peace for 100 turns[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Nirvana: Have the highest approval rating in the world for 100 turns[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Middle Way: Have cautious or better relations with all civilizations

[BOLD]Religious Victory:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Holy See: Be [LINK=BUILDING_APOSTOLIC_PALACE]Pope[\LINK] for 100 turns[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Holy Land: Control the [LINK=BUILDING_CHRISTIAN_SHRINE]Church of the Holy Sepulchre[\LINK] and make sure that at least 12 [LINK=SPECIALIST_GREAT_PRIEST]Great Prophets[\LINK] are settled in Catholic civilizations[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Holy Mission: Make sure at least 50% of the world's territory is controlled by Catholic civilizations

[BOLD]Religious Victory:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Harmony: Have friendly relations with five civilizations[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ritual: Have five wonders in the Confucian holy city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Loyalty: Control an army of 200 non-obsolete [LINK=UNITCOMBAT_MELEE]Melee[\LINK] or [LINK=UNITCOMBAT_GUN]Gunpowder[\LINK] units
[ICON_BULLET]Founded by First to Build a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu Temple[COLOR_REVERT]
[ICON_BULLET]Founded when the Apostolic Palace is built
[ICON_BULLET]Founded by First to Build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Apostolic Palace[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Founding Orthodoxy triggers the Great Schism

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Religion fondée par le premier à découvrir : [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]%s1_TechName[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Durch den ersten Entdecker der Technologie [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]%s1_TechName[COLOR_REVERT] gegründet

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Religious Victory:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Varna: Settle five different [LINK=CONCEPT_GREAT_PEOPLE_REDIRECT]Great People[\LINK] in the Hindu holy city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Artha: Experience 24 turns of golden age[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Kama: Make sure the five largest cities in the world are Hindu

TEXT.Italian: Città Santa (se c'è la religione ufficiale [ICON_RELIGION])

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Religious Victory:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Shahada: Spread Islam to 50%[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Hajj: Settle seven [LINK=CONCEPT_GREAT_PEOPLE_REDIRECT]Great People[\LINK] in the Muslim holy city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Jihad: Control five [LINK=CONCEPT_SHRINES_REDIRECT]Shrines[\LINK]

[BOLD]Religious Victory:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Patriarchates: Build four [LINK=BUILDING_ORTHODOX_CATHEDRAL]Orthodox Cathedrals[\LINK][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Iconography: Make sure the five most cultured cities in the world are Orthodox[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Communion: Make sure there are no [LINK=RELIGION_CHRISTIANITY]Catholic[\LINK] civilizations in the world
[ICON_BULLET]Founded by First [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholic[COLOR_REVERT] Nation to Discover [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Printing Press[COLOR_REVERT]
[ICON_BULLET]Founded by First [LINK=RELIGION_CHRISTIANITY]Catholic[\LINK] Nation to Discover [LINK=TECH_PRINTING_PRESS]Printing Press[\LINK]

[BOLD]Religious Victory:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Enlightenment: Be first to discover [LINK=TECH_LIBERALISM]Liberalism[\LINK], [LINK=TECH_CONSTITUTION]Constitution[\LINK] and [LINK=TECH_ECONOMICS]Economics[\LINK][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Work Ethic: Make sure five [LINK=SPECIALIST_GREAT_MERCHANT]Great Merchants[\LINK] and five [LINK=SPECIALIST_GREAT_ENGINEER]Great Engineers[\LINK] are settled in Protestant civilizations[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Religious Freedom: Make sure at least half of all civilizations are Protestant or [LINK=CIVIC_SECULARISM]Secular[\LINK]

[BOLD]Religious Victory:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Compassion: Have the highest life expectancy rating in the world for 100 turns[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Moderation: Control the [LINK=BUILDING_CONFUCIAN_SHRINE]Kong Lin[\LINK] and the [LINK=BUILDING_TAOIST_SHRINE]Dai Miao[\LINK] and combine their income to 40 gold[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Humility: Have legendary culture in the Taoist holy city

[BOLD]Religious Victory:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Adar: Acquire six [LINK=BONUS_INCENSE]Incense[\LINK] resources[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Mathra: Spread Zoroastrianism to 20%[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Shahnameh: Have legendary culture in the Zoroastrian holy city
